column5: I got a 4x6 snowbear utility tailer and want to know what bearing kit and size of bearing buddies are to be used with a 1 1/16 axle? Hopefully not a stupid question and ur assistance would be appreciated. Thx
since this trailer is bought from Canadian tire i would go there and ask them and they can sell the right one to you as well. Best of luck
The trailer section at canadian tire or princess auto has bearing kits for both 1" and 1 1/16" spindle sizes.
Ok so the axle size will determine size of bearing kit to use...correct?
typed in Snowbear  trailer brought me to Canadian tier looked at the 4x6 trailer clicked specifications and it said 1 1/16  go check it out if you want and see if its the same trailer as yours.

Yes, the spindle diameter deems the bearing size. Most small trailers are 1" or 1 1/16".. Best thing to do is disassemble and get a bearing out so you can see what number is on the roller bearing as its hard to distinguish the 1/16" difference.
